General.Name: Kinik Co
General.Description: Kinik Company produces and sells various abrasives, cutting tools, and reclaimed wafers in Taiwan and internationally. It also offers various conventional grinding wheels, diamond/CBN grinding wheels, DLC coatings, reclaimed wafers, porous ceramic chuck tables, CMP diamond disks, ultra precision machining tools, dicing blades, diamond rollers, wafer grinding wheels, diamond and CBN honey comb wheels, and anti-slip type vacuum chucks. The company also engages in buy and sell of wafers, as well as import and export transactions. Kinik Company was founded in 1953 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 64, Zhongshan Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23942
